Name: Morana
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with The Blade of Sorrows.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

If an enemy Formation ends a normal move, dash or disengage move within 6" of this model then roll 6D6. For each result of 4+ inflict 1 ethereal damage on the formation being rolled for and this formation may move 1" (this movement can end this model within 3" of an enemy formation)

In the tactics step select an enemy formation within 12" of this model and roll 3D6. If the result exceeds the Will Characteristic of the selected formation, then the selected formation may not perform actions until the end of the round and the selected formation must subtract half their Attacks Characteristic until the end of the round.

Spells.Name: The Burning Effigy (30)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy CHARACTER model within 18" of this model and roll a D6. On a result of 2+ the selected model suffers 1 ethereal damage, the roll another D6. Keep repeating this process until the selected model is destroyed or you do not roll a 2+.
